<hr>

A theme adapted from [phocus](https://github.com/phocus/gtk).

## **Installation**

Install [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/). Then:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Battlesquid/gtk.git && cd gtk/
make
sudo make install
```
